    • Method Detail

      • describe

        public void describe(java.lang.String nodeDescription,
                     java.lang.Runnable nodeCode)
        Creates a new node (branch) in the testing code with a description of it

        GreenTeaLatte deliciousLatte = new GreenTeaLatte(); deliciousLatte.describe("testing className", () -> { deliciousLatte.describe("testing methodName", () -> { // define tests and hooks for testing methodName }); });

        Parameters:
        nodeDescription - description of the new node
        nodeCode - code for the tests in the current node

      • it

        public void it(java.lang.String testDescription,
               java.lang.Runnable testCode)
        creates and attaches a test to the current node

        meant to be called with the runnable of a describe method, but can be be called on the root node

        Parameters:
        testDescription - description of the test
        testCode - code for the test

      • assertTest

        public void assertTest(java.lang.Boolean resultFromTestExpression)
        evaluates the result from a test expression

        must be called within a test (inside a runnable passed to the `it` method) used to determine if a test failed or passed

        Parameters:
        resultFromTestExpression - boolean from a user defined test expression

      • run

        public void run()
        runs all tests that have been defined

        public java.lang.String toString()
        converts the testing tree to a human readable string
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        human readable string representing testing tree
